Title: Udaan
Writer: Vikramaditya Motwane, Anurag Kashyap, Devanshu Singh (Rohan's poems and stories), Satyanshu Singh (Rohan's poems and stories)
Actors: Rajat Barmecha, Ronit Roy, Manjot Singh, Ram Kapoor
Plot: Expelled from his school, a 16-year old boy returns home to his abusive and oppressive father.
